description: Full-stack web development using modern technologies: HTML5, LESS, AngularJS, CoffeeScript, Ruby on Rails. Currently working in a team-based development environment using agile methodologies like Kanban and Scrum.

Design and development of 2 company websites: http://www.infomsg.com and http://www.infoset.com.tr. Both on-page and off-page SEO, website traffic growth. Turkish to English translation of website content.
